member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationDirection
member.summary: Navigation direction specifies the direction in which items should be navigated in Rotator control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationDirection.Horizontal
member.summary: Items can be navigated in horizontal direction.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationDirection.Vertical
member.summary: Items can be navigated in vertical direction.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripPosition
member.summary: Navigation strip position specifies the placement position of the navigation bar items such as thumbnail or dots relative to the slider area.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripPosition.Left
member.summary: Displays the position of the navigation bar items to left.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripPosition.Top
member.summary: Displays the position of the navigation bar items to top.

member.summary: Displays the position of the navigation bar items to right.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripPosition.Bottom
member.summary: Displays the position of the navigation bar items to bottom.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripMode
member.summary: Navigation strip mode specifies the appearance of navigation bar items. .

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripMode.Dots
member.summary: When a dots item is clicked, the slider will switch to the corresponding image data.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripMode.Thumbnail
member.summary: When a thumbnail item is clicked, the slider will switch to the corresponding image data.
